explanation: [0-0] On a road, a man riding an electric scooter is approaching from a distance. A nail is in the foreground of the shot, about to be run over by a tire.

[0-8] The electric scooter drives forward, its tire running over the nail. The picture shakes, and the scene switches to show the nail lodged in the electric scooter tire. The scooter stops. A hand holding a pink tire repair tool appears in the picture. The scene changes again, showing the pink tire repair tool being disassembled. Another hand appears, and both hands work together to operate the repair tool. Using pliers, they pull the nail out of the tire, and the tire starts to deflate.
